casebody.data:
Mark HENDERSON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 20, 2018

Heather Clark, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Timothy F. Costello, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Mark Henderson's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 181 Conn. App. 778, 189 A.3d 135 (2018), is denied.
